org.mitre.uma.web

Class PolicyAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.uma.web.PolicyAPI

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/resourceset")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\')")
public class PolicyAPI
extends Object
    API for managing policies on resource sets.
    Author:
    jricher
